version_description:
Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

Thank you for the comments submitted by email. We appreciate your feedback and are constantly working on making the app better.

It's finally here. After months of hard work, we are excited to share the better version of the app with you.

- Weather forecast. Plan the day ahead easily - get the current weather conditions & forecast temperatures at your location.
- Adv

- Now there is an option to track your sleep even if the alarm is off: you don’t need to set an alarm clock on Sunday or your day off to see how you slept this night.
- Сock-a-doodle-doo! Ladies and gentlemen, please welcome the new icon! We’ve chosen

- Performance and stability improvements for flawless work on iOS 11.

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! Don't hesitate to share your impressions and feedback with us via support@apalon.com

- Performance and stability improvements. Optimized for iOS 11.
